text: Se√°n Dermot Fintan O'Leary, Jr. known as Dermot O'Leary (born 24 May 1973) is an English television and radio presenter. ==Early life== O'Leary was born in Colchester, Essex to Irish parents. He has dual citizenship British and Irish. ==Career== He started presenting Big Brother's Little Brother in 2001. He presented the show until 2008 when Big Brother ended. He has presented The X Factor since 2007 to 2018. He currently presents This Morning on Fridays alongside Alison Hammond when Phillip Schofield and Holly Willoughby are absent from the show. ==Personal life== O'Leary married Dee Koppang on 14 September 2012. ==References== Category:1973 births Category:Living people Category:BBC radio presenters Category:Channel 4 presenters Category:English television presenters Category:Irish television personalities Category:ITV presenters Category:Television personalities from Essex Category:People from Colchester
title: Dermot O'Leary
